rdfs:label: FORMAC
ns:common.topic.description: FORMAC, acronym of FORmula MAnipulation Compiler was an early computer algebra system based on FORTRAN. It was developed by Jean E. Sammet.\nFORMAC supported computation, manipulation, and use of symbolic expressions.

ns:common.document.text: FORMAC, acronym of FORmula MAnipulation Compiler, is an extension of FORTRAN. It was developed by Jean E. Sammet.\nThe additional capabilities of FORMAC permit direct computation, manipulation, and use of functions of advanced mathematics which can only be done indirectly and approximately in FORTRAN.

ns:type.object.name: FORMAC
